Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 5/18/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/31/1985 with a Pulled Tricep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to San Diego on 7/5/1985 (Going to SD: P Mike Cook, P Eric Bell, P Rod Nichols. Going to LAD: P Roy lee Jackson)...
Injured on 8/29/1985 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Earned first career win on 4/5/1988...
Had first career hit on 4/11/1988, off Joe Magrane (STL)...
Injured on 8/5/1990 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5 weeks...
Released by San Diego on 5/11/1991...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 6/2/1991 to a minor league deal...
Hit first career homerun on 7/23/1991, off Jeff Fassero (CHC)...
Released by New York (M) on 9/7/1991...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/5/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
